attributes.action: Ban Puppy Farms and Review Laws regarding any Dog Breeding
attributes.additional_details:
We, the undersigned, call on the Government to introduce minimum standards such as those adopted as part of the Kennel Club’s Assured Breeder Scheme for the breeding of all dogs in the UK, in order to help bring an end to puppy farming.

We also call on the Government to legislate all breeders by licensing and microchipping all puppies.  Making it illegal to sell a puppy that has no microchip and accompanying records.
